sentences.sContent: The writers on the syllabus consistently try to imagine a way to make those claims, make those claims for the primacy and the importance of what they do.
sentences.sContent_eng: The writers on the syllabus consistently try to imagine a way to make those claims, make those claims for the primacy and the importance of what they do.
sentences.sCn: 大纲里的作家一直在尝试,设想出一种方法来提出要求，把他们写的书放在首要地位,使他们的要求得到重视。

trans.tranOther: You can refer to the subjects that are studied in a particular course as the syllabus
